title: Website Pack
description: A collection of modern and responsive website templates for any project.
content:
Build stunning websites quickly with this modern template pack. Perfect for agencies, freelancers, and businesses.

What's Included:

  • 10+ responsive templates
  • HTML, CSS, and JS files
  • Easy customization

title: UI Kit
description: A comprehensive Figma UI kit tailored for dashboard designs.
content:
Create stunning dashboards with this Figma UI kit. Designed for data visualization and admin panels.

Features:

  • 50+ customizable components
  • Light and dark modes
  • Pixel-perfect design

title: SEO Plugin
description: A powerful WordPress plugin to improve your website's SEO rankings.
content:
Optimize your WordPress site with this SEO plugin. Perfect for boosting your search engine visibility.

Key Features:

  • Keyword analysis
  • XML sitemap generation
  • Meta tag optimization

title: E-comm Template
description: A professionally designed Figma template for e-commerce platforms.
content:
Design beautiful online stores with this e-commerce Figma template. Suitable for any industry.

Highlights:

  • Product pages and checkout flow
  • Mobile and desktop views
  • Fully editable components

title: Dev Tools
description: A set of useful add-ons for enhancing your development workflow.
content:
Boost your productivity with this add-on pack for developers. Includes tools for debugging and testing.

Includes:

  • Code snippet manager
  • Real-time debugging tools
  • Browser extensions

title: Icon Set
description: A collection of custom icons for modern web and mobile applications.
content:
Enhance your designs with this custom icon set. Perfect for web and app development.

Details:

  • 500+ unique icons
  • SVG, PNG, and AI formats
  • Scalable and editable
